title: Arturo's Ghoul
description: Arturo wakes in a desert with a ghoul standing over him. Where did Arturo come from and why can't he remember his past? What is the desert of sun and sand all around him? Maybe only the Ghoul has the answer. Arturo must follow the creature through the wasteland to find out . . . but the answer might be stranger than he can imagine or understand.
author: A.Z. Banda
